He was also a TV announcer and is perhaps best remembered for his portrayal of Stan Ogden in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street, which he played from 1964 until his death in 1984. ==Other websites== * * Stan and Hilda Ogden voted most popular ITV characters of all time Category:1914 births Category:1984 deaths Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:Actors from Sussex
